member.name: D2D1_PROPERTY_BINDING
member.summary: Defines a property binding to a pair of functions which get and set the corresponding property.

member.name: D2D1_PROPERTY_BINDING.setFunction
member.summary: The function that will receive the data to set.

member.name: D2D1_PROPERTY_BINDING.getFunction
member.summary: The function that will be asked to write the output data.
